text:
Mr Lee is a kind and caring teacher,who has decades of experience teaching math.
He has taught me during my secondary school days and am so glad he is still teaching and my son has been going for his lessons for the past 3 years.
He is still teaching due to the passion and care for the kids.

My son grades improved hugely and he scored AL1 for psle math in year 2024.

Highly recommend anyone who needs a math teacher to Mr Lee.

My math has gotten better ever since I joined this math tuition centre and allowed me to get full marks for my WA in sec 1. The teacher is funny and nice and provides breaks and may host celebrations at times as well. Overall, my math has improved by a lot and has made me more interested in math and I would definitely recommend coming for this tuition.
My son scored almost full marks in his recent WA after joining Mr Lee's class for a month. Before joining, he didn't know his work. I would recommend to anyone in need of maths help. üëç
improved in math greatly, he interacts with students fully during lessons to make sure we understand. lessons are always very fun and engaging üëç recommend üëç
Mr Lee is a fun teacher who always makes his lessons fun and enriching for his students. He helps students get good results or noticeably improves their results.
